name: Accordion
description: The accordion component allows the user to show and hide sections of related content on a page.

name: Banner
description: Banner component for displaying messages or alerts.

name: Box
description: Box is a component used to wrap content and apply spacing, borders, and background color (like a div).

name: Breadcrumbs
description:
Breadcrumbs is a component for displaying a navigation trail, typically used for indicating the current page's
location within a hierarchy of content.

examples.code:
import React from 'react';
import Breadcrumbs from './Breadcrumbs';
import { Icon } from '../Icon';
import { Link } from '../Link';

// Example of Breadcrumbs usage
const Example = () => {

  return (
    <>
      <Breadcrumbs>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' rightIcon={<Icon name='Home' />}/>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' current>Link</Link>
      </Breadcrumbs>

      <Breadcrumbs variant='shape' maxItems={3} itemsAfterCollapse={3} >
        <Link size='lg' href='#' rightIcon={<Icon name='Home' />}/>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' current>Link</Link>
      </Breadcrumbs>

      <Breadcrumbs variant='stroke' maxItems={3} itemsBeforeCollapse={2} itemsAfterCollapse={3}>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' rightIcon={<Icon name='Home' />}/>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' current>Link</Link>
      </Breadcrumbs>
    </>
  );
};

name: Button
description:
Button is a component for triggering an action or event.

It is also used as IconButton, when onlyIcon is true.

name: Card
description: Card is a React component that wraps content and allows customization of its dimensions.

name: Checkbox
description: Checkbox is a component representing a checkbox input.

name: CheckboxLabel
description: CheckboxLabel is a React component representing a labeled checkbox.

name: Combobox
description: Combobox component is used to combobox a single value from a list.

name: DateInput
description: DateInput is a component used to get user input in a date field.

name: Divider
description: Divider is a React component representing a visual separator.

name: Dropmenu
description: Dropmenu is a React component representing a dropdown menu.

name: Feedback
description: Feedback is a React component for collecting user feedback, offering emoji or thumb reactions.

name: FileInput
description: FileInput is a component used to get user input in a file field.

name: Flex
description: Flex component is a wrapper component that allows you to easily create a flex container element.

name: Icon
description: Icon is a component for displaying icons.

name: Link
description: Link component allows to navigate between pages in the same application.

name: Modal
description: Modal component is used to display content in a layer above the app.

name: Multiselect
description: Multiselect component is used to select multiple values from a list.

name: Pagination
description: Pagination component is used to navigate through pages of related content.

name: ProgressBar
description: ProgressBar component indicates the progress of an operation.

examples.code:
import React from 'react';
import ProgressBar from './ProgressBar';
import {Flex} from "../Flex";

// Example of ProgressBar usage
const Example = () => {

    return (
        <>
            <Flex direction='column' gap='md-4'>
                <ProgressBar progress={0} />
                <ProgressBar progress={25} />
                <ProgressBar progress={50} />
                <ProgressBar progress={75} />
                <ProgressBar progress={100} />
            </Flex>
            <Flex direction='column' gap='md-4' backgroundColor='grey'>
                <ProgressBar progress={0} inverted={true}/>
                <ProgressBar progress={25} inverted={true}/>
                <ProgressBar progress={50} inverted={true}/>
                <ProgressBar progress={75} inverted={true}/>
                <ProgressBar progress={100} inverted={true}/>
            </Flex>

            <Flex direction='column' gap='md-4'>
                <ProgressBar type='separated' progress={0} />
                <ProgressBar type='separated' progress={25} />
                <ProgressBar type='separated' progress={50} />
                <ProgressBar type='separated' progress={75} />
                <ProgressBar type='separated' progress={100} />
            </Flex>
            <Flex direction='column' gap='md-4' backgroundColor='grey'>
                <ProgressBar type='separated' progress={0} inverted={true}/>
                <ProgressBar type='separated' progress={25} inverted={true}/>
                <ProgressBar type='separated' progress={50} inverted={true}/>
                <ProgressBar type='separated' progress={75} inverted={true}/>
                <ProgressBar type='separated' progress={100} inverted={true}/>
            </Flex>
        </>
    );
};

name: Radio
description: A radio button allows the user to select one option from a set.

name: RadioGroup
description: RadioGroup component allows to group RadioLabels together.

name: RadioLabel
description: RadioLabel is a React component representing a labelled radio button.

name: Rate
description: Rate is a component that allows users to rate something. The evaluation can be done with stars or hearts.

examples.code:
import React from 'react';
import Rate from './Rate';
import {Flex} from "../Flex";

// Example of RateAndFeedback usage
const Example = () => {

    return (
        <>
          <Flex gap='md-4'>
            <Flex direction='column' gap='sm-8'>
              <Rate type='star' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'xs'} onChange={(e, value) => console.log(value)}></Rate>
              <Rate type='star' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'sm'} onChange={(e) => console.log(e)}></Rate>
              <Rate type='star' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'md'} onChange={(e, value) => console.log(value)}></Rate>
              <Rate type='star' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'xl'} onChange={(e) => console.log(e)}></Rate>
              <Rate type='star' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'xxl'} onChange={() => console.log("third")}></Rate>
              <Rate type='star' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'xxxl'} onChange={() => console.log("fourth")}></Rate>
            </Flex>
            <Flex direction='column' gap='sm-8'>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'xs'} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'sm'} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'md'} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'xl'} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'xxl'} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'xxxl'} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
            </Flex>
            <Flex direction='column' gap='sm-8'>
              <Rate type='star' size={'xs'} onChange={(e, value) => console.log(value)}></Rate>
              <Rate type='star' size={'sm'} onChange={(e) => console.log(e)}></Rate>
              <Rate type='star' size={'md'} onChange={(e, value) => console.log(value)}></Rate>
              <Rate type='star' size={'xl'} onChange={(e) => console.log(e)}></Rate>
              <Rate type='star' size={'xxl'} onChange={() => console.log("third")}></Rate>
              <Rate type='star' size={'xxxl'} onChange={() => console.log("fourth")}></Rate>
            </Flex>
            <Flex direction='column' gap='sm-8'>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'outline'} size={'xs'} defaultValue={3.5} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'outline'} size={'sm'} defaultValue={3.5} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'outline'} size={'md'} defaultValue={3.5} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'outline'} size={'xl'} defaultValue={3.5} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'outline'} size={'xxl'} defaultValue={3.5} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'outline'} size={'xxxl'} defaultValue={3.5} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
            </Flex>
          </Flex>
        </>
    );
};

name: Select
description: Select is a component that allows users pick an option from a list of options.

name: SelectBasic
description: Basic input select with no label nor hint

info.code:
import { SelectProps } from '../Select'

export type SelectBasicProps = Omit<SelectProps, 'label' | 'labelProps'>;

name: SidePanel
description: SidePanel is a component that displays content from the edge of the screen.

name: Slider
description: Slider is a component that allows users to set a value by moving a slider thumb between min and max values.

name: Spinner
description:
Spinner is a component that indicates the loading state of a page or a section.
It is used when the user needs to wait for an action to complete.

info.code:
import {SafeKeyOf} from '../utils'

interface SpinnerSize {
    12: true,
    14: true,
    16: true,
    20: true,
    24: true,
    28: true,
    32: true
}

export interface SpinnerProps {
  /**
   * The size of the spinner in pixels (e.g. 12, 14 16, 20, 24, 28, 32).
   */
    size?: SafeKeyOf<SpinnerSize>
  /**
   * If true, the spinner color will be inverted (light spinner on dark background).
   */
    inverted?: boolean
  /**
   * The state of the spinner. Can be 'indeterminate' (animates continually without regard to progress) or 'determinate' (displays exactly how much progress has been made).
   */
    state?: 'determinate' | 'indeterminate'
  /**
   * The value of the progress indicator for the determinate variant.
   */
    value?: number
}

examples.code:
import React from 'react';
import Spinner from './Spinner';
import {Flex} from "../Flex";

// Example of Spinner usage
const Example = () => {

    return (
        <>
            <Flex gap='md-5'>
                <Flex direction='column' gap='sm-6'>
                    <Spinner size={12}/>
                    <Spinner size={14}/>
                    <Spinner size={16}/>
                    <Spinner size={20}/>
                    <Spinner size={24}/>
                    <Spinner size={28}/>
                    <Spinner size={32}/>
                </Flex>
                <Flex direction='column' gap='sm-6'>
                    <Spinner size={12} state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={14} state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={16} state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={20} state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={24} state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={28} state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={32} state='determinate' value={25}/>
                </Flex>
                <Flex direction='column' gap='sm-6' backgroundColor='grey'>
                    <Spinner inverted size={12}/>
                    <Spinner inverted size={14}/>
                    <Spinner inverted size={16}/>
                    <Spinner inverted size={20}/>
                    <Spinner inverted size={24}/>
                    <Spinner inverted size={28}/>
                    <Spinner inverted size={32}/>
                </Flex>
                <Flex direction='column' gap='sm-6' backgroundColor='grey'>
                    <Spinner size={12} inverted state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={14} inverted state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={16} inverted state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={20} inverted state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={24} inverted state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={28} inverted state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={32} inverted state='determinate' value={25}/>
                </Flex>
            </Flex>
        </>
    );
};

name: Step
description: Step is a component used to display a single step of a stepper. It is used as a direct child of Stepper.

name: Stepper
description: Stepper is a component to display progress through a sequence of logical and numbered steps.

name: Switch
description: Switch is a visual toggle between two mutually exclusive states  on and off.

name: SwitchLabel
description:
SwitchLabel is a React component representing a labeled Switch component.
It is a visual toggle between two mutually exclusive states  on and off.

name: Table
description: Table is a component that renders a table with virtualized rows.

name: Tabs
description: Tabs is a component that displays a group of tabs.

name: Tag
description: Tag is a component that displays a tag. It can be used to display a label, a category, or a status.

name: TextInput
description: TextInput is a component used to get user input in a text field.

name: TextInputBasic
description: A TextInput component  with a label and hint.

info.code:
import {TextInputProps} from '../TextInput'

export type TextInputBasicProps = Omit<TextInputProps, 'label' | 'labelProps'>

name: Tooltip
description: Tooltip component is used to display additional information on hover.

name: Typography
description: Typography component is used to display text in different styles.
